atbat.des: J. Hardy flies out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Nick Markakis lines out to center fielder Curtis Granderson.
Adam Jones singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Curtis Granderson.

pitch.cc: Ivan Nova had Adam Jones down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Vladimir Guerrero singles on a line drive to center fielder Curtis Granderson. Adam Jones to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Ivan Nova had Vladimir Guerrero down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Mark Reynolds walks. Vladimir Guerrero to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Ivan Nova is trying to tie up Mark Reynolds with fastballs inside, where Mark Reynolds hits .254.

atbat.des: Matt Wieters lines out to left fielder Brett Gardner.

pitch.cc: Ivan Nova is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Andy Fletcher.

atbat.des: Derek Jeter called out on strikes.

pitch.cc: Zach Britton is trying to tie up Derek Jeter with fastballs inside, where Derek Jeter hits .301.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson singles on a line drive to center fielder Adam Jones.
Mark Teixeira walks. Curtis Granderson to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Zach Britton is trying to tie up Mark Teixeira with fastballs inside, where Mark Teixeira hits .202.

atbat.des: Robinson Cano singles on a ground ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold. Curtis Granderson scores. Mark Teixeira advances to 3rd, on throwing error by left fielder Nolan Reimold.
Nick Swisher reaches on fielding error by shortstop J. Hardy. Mark Teixeira scores. Robinson Cano to 2nd.
Andruw Jones doubles (3) on a fly ball to left fielder Nolan Reimold. Robinson Cano scores. Nick Swisher to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Zach Britton didn't read the scouting report; Andruw Jones loves two-seam fastball in that zone.

atbat.des: Russell Martin singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis. Nick Swisher scores. Andruw Jones to 3rd.
Eduardo Nunez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Adam Jones. Andruw Jones scores. Russell Martin to 2nd.
Brett Gardner singles on a ground ball to pitcher Zach Britton. Russell Martin to 3rd. Eduardo Nunez to 2nd.
Derek Jeter singles on a ground ball to right fielder Nick Markakis. Russell Martin scores. Eduardo Nunez scores. Brett Gardner to 3rd. Derek Jeter to 2nd on the throw.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Jason Berken replaces Zach Britton.

atbat.des: Curtis Granderson strikes out swinging.

pitch.cc: Jason Berken went back to the slider even though Curtis Granderson hit for a single last time up.
Jason Berken shows faith in Matt Wieters by throwing the slider in the dirt.

atbat.des: Mark Teixeira doubles (17) on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis. Brett Gardner scores. Derek Jeter scores.
Robinson Cano singles on a line drive to right fielder Nick Markakis. Mark Teixeira scores.

pitch.cc: Jason Berken is trying to tie up Robinson Cano with fastballs inside, where Robinson Cano hits .300.

atbat.des: Nick Swisher homers (14) on a fly ball to right field. Robinson Cano scores.

pitch.cc: Jason Berken is trying to tie up Nick Swisher with fastballs inside, where Nick Swisher hits .300.

atbat.des: Andruw Jones walks.
Russell Martin grounds into a force out, shortstop J. Hardy to second baseman Robert Andino. Andruw Jones out at 2nd.
